医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
UVA科学家开发了AI工具来加速新疾病治疗的发展弗吉尼亚大学医学院科学家创建了一种计算工具来加速新疾病治疗的发展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250318/uva-scientists-develop--ai-tool-tool-tool-too-too--too--accelerate-the-development--new-disease-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250318/uva-scientists-develop--ai-tool-tool-tool-too--to-to-accelerate-the-development--new-disease-reatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dc469128-947c-4986-b957-fa55555555d9db3cf2 Tue, 18 Mar 2025 13:23:34 -0400 UVA scientists develop AI tool to accelerate the development of new disease treatments
添加姜黄素可以提高贝达奎林在对抗脓肿感染中的功效脓肿分枝杆菌是一种快速增长的致病性分枝杆菌，可引起肺部感染，患有呼吸道疾病或免疫功能低下的人面临更高的风险。它也会引起皮肤感染。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250318/adding-curcumin-boosts-the-felficacy--bedaquiline-bedaquiline-bedaquiline-in-combating-m-abscessus-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250318/adding-curcumin-boosts-the-felcicacy-of-bedaquiline-bedaquiline-in-combating-m-abscessus-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=556AF91F-37FB-4121-A005-183C80787EE23 Tue, 18 Mar 2025 13:19:49 -0400 Adding curcumin boosts the efficacy of bedaquiline in combating M. abscessus infections
UZH研究人员开发技术来测试单个鼠标中的25种抗体通常在实验动物中单独测试新的活性成分，例如抗体。 UZH的研究人员现在已经开发了一种技术，该技术可用于同时在一只鼠标中同时测试25种抗体。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250318/uzh-researchers-develop-tevelop-technology-te-technology-to-tect-25-antibodies-in-a-a-a-a-a-a-single-mouse.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250318/uzh-researchers-develop-tevelop-technology-technology-technology-tot-test-test-test-25-antibodies-in-a-a-a-single-mouse.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=294E4D82-D0A3-4729-B08E-CC1F88D29EA4 Tue, 18 Mar 2025 13:10:00 -0400 UZH researchers develop technology to test 25 antibodies in a single mouse
与男性相比，生活方式和健康因素对女性心血管风险的影响更大根据美国心脏病学院年度科学会议（ACC25）的一项研究，与男性相比，与男性相比，与男性心血管风险相比，与心脏病有关的生活方式和健康因素似乎对女性的心血管风险产生了更大的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250318/lifestyle-and-health-factors-have-greater-reater-impact-on-cardiescular-carcarcular-cardiascular----- in-women-than-men.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250318/lifestyle-and-health-factors-have-greater-reater-impact-on-cardiascular-on-cardiascular------- in-women-than-men.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4703cd2C-12A0-4666-91A9-3245ECB98DE7 Tue, 18 Mar 2025 13:02:22 -0400 Lifestyle and health factors have greater impact on cardiovascular risk in women than men
与心脏代谢疾病患者相关的健康植物性饮食与寿命更长根据美国心脏病学院年度科学学院（ACC.25）的一项研究，患有心脏代谢疾病（例如肥胖症，糖尿病和心脏病）的人可能会增加其寿命更长的机会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250318/healthy-plant-基于diets-diets-linked-to-longer-life-life-life-for-people-with-cardiometiomemememememememememememementebolic-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250318/Healthy-plant-based-diets-linked-to-longer-life-for-people-with-cardiometabolic-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=304d76Ae-6f92-484D-8563-7CB7978FB8FE Tue, 18 Mar 2025 12:58:50 -0400 Healthy plant-based diets linked to longer life for people with cardiometabolic disorders
具有限制性堕胎法的州的氰基先天性心脏病的发病率增加根据美国最高法院的2022年裁决将堕胎法律掌握在州手中的一项研究，该研究在美国心脏病学院的年度学院的一项研究中显示，出生于严重心脏缺陷的婴儿（CCHD）出生的婴儿的发病率在颁布了限制性堕胎法律的州中起伏不已。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250318/cyanotic-congenital-disease-disease-incidence-incividence-increases-increases-in-spates-n-states with-states with-striptive totrictive-afortive-afortive-afortive-aftorment saspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250318/cyanotic-congentor-congenital-disease-incese--incidence-incividence-inceres-increases-increases-in-states-in-spates-with-with-states with-strictive-afortive totrictive-afortive-afortive-afortive-afortive-aftortive-aptortive-austs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fa275de9-A501-417D-A815-54886092E29A Tue, 18 Mar 2025 12:54:00 -0400 Cyanotic congenital heart disease incidence increases in states with restrictive abortion laws
对Kiyohiko Sugano教授对药物吸收和预测建模的见解了解药物的吸收和预测建模如何推动药物和精度医学的进步。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250318/insights-into-into-drug-absorption-and-pridective-modeling-with-professor-kiyohiko-sugano.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250318/insights-into-into-into-drug-absorption-and-pridective-modeling-with-professor-kiyohiko-sugano.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=13486528-9676-4974-a68f-e60761b6f480 Tue, 18 Mar 2025 11:03:00 -0400 Insights into drug absorption and predictive modeling with Professor Kiyohiko Sugano
大麻的使用是为了增加年轻人的心脏病发作风险现在，大麻在许多地方是合法的，但是安全吗？两项新的研究增加了越来越多的证据，表明使用大麻的人比不使用这种药物的人，即使在年轻人和其他健康的成年人中也更有可能遭受心脏病发作。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250318/cannabis-use-found-found-to-raise-to-raise-hert-antack-risk-risk-among-younger-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250318/cannabis-use-found-found-to-raise-raise-hert-antack-risk-risk-arisk-among-younger-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=62ED954C-66FD-4E9D-83CB-0A46A2B9A6B8 Tue, 18 Mar 2025 10:40:36 -0400 Cannabis use found to raise heart attack risk among younger adults
基于AI的神经网络彻底改变了癌症治疗预测基于初始的人工智能（AI）神经网络可以快速分析和解释患者样品中的数百万个细胞，从而预测组织中的分子变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250318/ai-base---neal-neal-network-revolutions-cancer-wartement-predictions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250318/ai-base---------------------- and-neur-network-revolutions-cancer-treatment-predictions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1Ae824df-e273-43cd-85De-068A1937C502 Tue, 18 Mar 2025 10:38:18 -0400 AI-based neural network revolutionizes cancer treatment predictions
乳腺癌手术后证明对淋巴水肿有效的淋巴结转移一项来自芬兰的多中心研究表明，淋巴结转移是一种可行的治疗方法，可用于乳腺癌手术后受影响的肢体肿胀（一种称为淋巴水肿）的肿胀。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250318/lymph-node-node-transfer-proven-effer-for-lymphedema-after-after-fer-breast-cancer-surgery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250318/lymph-node-node-transfer-proven-effer-for-lymphedema-after-fer-fer-breast-cancer-surery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=43582E11-1B0A-4F04-A1BB-A5C400EC7D1B Tue, 18 Mar 2025 10:22:00 -0400 Lymph node transfer proven effective for lymphedema after breast cancer surgery
